[vc_row][vc_column][cz_gap height_tablet="0px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-6"][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_86262" sk_overall_mobile="margin-top:-30px;" cz_title=""]

ABOUT US

WHO WE ARE?[/cz_title][cz_gap height="40px" height_tablet="80px" height_mobile="30px"][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_26277" sk_overall="font-size:18px;" sk_overall_mobile="font-size:16px;line-height:1.6;" cz_title=""]Floristry is the production, commerce, and trade in flowers. It encompasses flower care and handling, floral design, or flower arranging, merchandising, production, display and flower delivery. Wholesale florists sell bulk flowers and related supplies to professionals in the trade. Retail florists offer fresh flowers and related products and services to consumers. The first flower shop in the United States opened prior to 1851.[/cz_title][cz_gap height="40px" height_tablet="80px" height_mobile="20px"][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_54108" sk_overall="font-size:18px;" sk_overall_mobile="font-size:16px;line-height:1.6;" cz_title=""]Flower Shop concerns the cultivation of flowers as well as their arrangement, sale. Much of the raw material supplied for the floristry trade comes from the cut flowers industry. Florist shops, along with online stores, are the main flower-only outlets, but supermarkets, garden supply stores, and filling stations also sell flowers.
[/cz_title][cz_gap height_mobile="30px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][cz_stylish_list icon_hover_fx="cz_sl_icon_hover_flash" id="cz_29193" OUR HISTORY

WHAT WE DONE?
[/cz_title][cz_gap height="40px" height_mobile="30px"][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_37526" sk_overall="font-size:18px;" sk_overall_mobile="font-size:16px;line-height:1.6;"]People have been using natural objects, such as tree stumps, rocks and moss, as furniture since the beginning of human civilisation. Archaeological research shows that from around 30,000 years ago, people began constructing and carving their own furniture, using wood, stone, and animal bones.[/cz_title][cz_gap height_mobile="20px"][cz_gallery layout="cz_grid_c6" hover="cz_grid_1_no_hover" two_columns_on_mobile="true" id="cz_92917" images="1647,1648,1651,1650,1652,1649"][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_57275" sk_overall="font-size:18px;" sk_overall_mobile="font-size:16px;line-height:1.6;" cz_title=""]All you need for your garden or office in one place, any flower or plant that you like and any fertilizer for any knid of plants.

In the beautiful surroundings of Upcote Farm in Cheltenham, 2000 Trees festival is a gem of a find if you’ve been lucky enough…I found this festival in 2008 when ‘Reuben’ were due to headline, but even though they disbanded a few weeks prior to the festival, us fans still decided to turn up, and boy am I glad I did… Being a small sized 5000 capacity festival, but not enough to have 20 minute waits at the bars and toilets. The balance between atmosphere and accessibility is second to none. The food stalls are all hand picked, the same with the local ciders/ales and beers, the organisers have really nailed it on the head, you can tell they themselves are, as well as bringing in some big names, it really does cater for every type music fan. In the beautiful surroundings of Upcote Farm in Cheltenham, 2000 Trees festival is a gem of a find if you’ve been lucky enough…I found this festival in 2008 when ‘Reuben’ were due to headline, but even though they disbanded a few weeks prior to the festival, us fans still decided to turn up, and boy am I glad I did… Being a small sized 5000 capacity festival, but not enough to have 20 minute waits at the bars and toilets. The balance between atmosphere and accessibility is second to none. The food stalls are all hand picked, the same with the local ciders/ales and beers, the organisers have really nailed it on the head, you can tell they themselves are, as well as bringing in some big names, it really does cater for every type music fan. item.title: Snake Plant
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Plants are mainly multicellular organisms, predominantly photosynthetic eukaryotes of the kingdom Plantae. Historically, plants were treated as one of two kingdoms including all living things that were not animals, and all algae and fungi were treated as plants. However, all current definitions of Plantae exclude the fungi and some algae, as well as the prokaryotes.

item.title: Japanese Holly
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Furniture refers to movable objects intended to support various human activities such as seating (e.g., chairs, stools, and sofas), eating (tables), and sleeping (e.g., beds). Furniture is also used to hold objects at a convenient height for work (as horizontal surfaces above the ground, such as tables and desks), or to store things (e.g., cupboards and shelves). Furniture can be a product of design and is considered a form of decorative art

Historically, plants were treated as one of two kingdoms including all living things that were not animals, and all algae and fungi were treated as plants. However, all current definitions of Plantae exclude the fungi and some algae, as well as the prokaryotes.
